hadiths.text: Narrated 'Aishah daughter of Sa'd:That her father said: I had a complaint at Mecca. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) came to pay a sick-visit to me. He put his hand on my forehead, wiped my chest and belly, and then said: O Allah! heal up Sa'd and complete his immigration

chapter.ara-name: باب الدُّعَاءِ لِلْمَرِيضِ بِالشِّفَاءِ عِنْدَ الْعِيَادَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Supplicating For The Sick Person To Be Cured When Visiting Him
